Commands.Healing Wind: Raises all party members' BRV and restores their HP based on Aerith's Attack.  Grants all party members Small Initial BRV Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Prayer of the Cetra: Revives if target is KO and slightly restores their HP.  Grants Cetra's Favor for 8 turns.  Low Action Delay.  Cetra's Favor moderately raises Defense and grants BRV Regen.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Raises all allies' BRV by 120% of Aerith's iBRV.
Commands.BRV Regen Attack All: Slightly raises party Attack for 3 turns  Grants party 「BRV Regen」 for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Fury Brand: Raises party BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Descendant of the Ancients」 for 3 turns   While 「Descendant of the Ancients」 is active:  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 and 「BRV Attack+」 to 「BRV Attack+」  　∟ 2-HIT Magic BRV Attack  　　Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV  　　Low Action Delay  - Turns 「HP Attack」 and 「HP Attack+」 to 「HP Attack++」  　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV  　　Follows-up with a 2-HIT Magic BRV+HP Attack  　　BRV stolen can overflow up to 120%  　　Low Action Delay   「Descendant of the Ancients」 raises party Attack and Max BRV overflow limit

Passives.Healing Wind Charge: Increases the max uses of Healing Wind by 1.
Passives.HP Damage Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack after taking HP damage.
Passives.Healing Wind Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Healing Wind.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Prayer of the Cetra Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Prayer of the Cetra.
Passives.The Planet's Prayer: Grants a low probability of gaining a Small Max BRV Up buff for 3 turns after a BRV Attack.
Passives.A Flower Blooming in the Slums: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Defense of allies when HP is Max.
Passives.BRV Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV when HP is over 50%.
Passives.Healing Wind Extend: Healing Wind  use +1When using  Healing Wind :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Slightly raises the HP recovery based on Attack- Moderately improves  Initial BRV Up - Lowers Action Delay
Passives.Cetra's Prayer Extend: When using  Cetra s Prayer :- Raises self and target BRV based on Initial BRV- Slightly raises the HP recovery based on target's Max HP- Slightly improves the effects of  Cetra s Favor - Adds the effects of Small Max BRV Up and Large Magical Attack Up to  Cetra s Favor  and extends its duration by 1 turn- Slightly improves the effects of  Attack Up  and extends its duration by 5 turns- Lowers Action DelayWhen using  BRV Attack+ :- Slightly raises its potencyWhile  Cetra s Favor  is active,  HP Attack  turns to  HP Attack+  with the following effects:- Raises BRV based on Max BRV and follows-up with a 1-HIT Magic BRV+HP Attack- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Lowers Action Delay
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Power: Raises party Initial BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.BRV Regen Attack All Extend: When using  Advance All , adds the following effects:- Marginally improves  Attack Up  effect- Slightly improves  BRV Regen  effect

Weapons.Wizard Staff CP: 35: Increases Prayer of the Cetra's healing potency and improves the effect of Cetra's Favor.Increases its max uses by 1 and grants Medium Attack Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Mythril Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Fury Brand
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: BRV Regen Attack All  use +1Duration of  BRV Regen Attack All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Guard Stick CP: 15: Raises the HP recovery and BRV gain of Healing Wind.Increases the potency of Initial BRV Up and extends its duration.
